meanings.definition: Reynards (verb): to act cunningly or slyly
meanings.sent1: She reynards her way through negotiations to get the best deal.
meanings.sent2: He always reynards when playing pranks on his friends.
meanings.sent3: The raccoon reynards its way into the trash can for a late-night snack.
meanings.sent4: The spy reynards through the shadows, unseen by his enemies.
meanings.sent5: The clever magician reynards his tricks to keep the audience guessing.
